Package org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.model

Interface GenotypedVariant

All Known Subinterfaces:
LiricalVariant
public interface GenotypedVariant
A description of variant coordinates, sample genotypes, and filtering status for LIRICAL analysis.

The variant has a genomeBuild() to describe the reference system. The variant() provides variant coordinates using Svart's GenomicVariant data structure. The variant genotypes for a set of samples can be accessed via alleleCount(String). Last, LIRICAL uses the variants that passed all filters in the analysis (passedFilters()). However, we need to retain the failed variants too to report the passed/failed variants in the report.

    • alleleCount

      Optional<AlleleCount> alleleCount(String sample)
      Get allele count for given sample.
      Parameters:
      sample - String with sample identifier.
      Returns:
      optional with the allele count or an empty optional if data for the sample is missing.

    • passedFilters

      boolean passedFilters()
      Returns:
      true if the variant passed the filters, according to the variant source (e.g. VCF file).

    • failedFilters

      default boolean failedFilters()
      Returns:
      true if the variant failed the filters, according to the variant source (e.g. VCF file).
